original_text: You have many workers: stonecutters, masons and carpenters, as well as those skilled in every kind of work
korean_text: 또 장인이 네게 많이 있나니 곧 석수와 목수와 온갖 일에 익숙한 모든 사람이니라

sentences.original_text: as well as those skilled in every kind of work
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 종류의 일에 숙련된 사람들도 있습니다
